column4: Does anyone have any experience getting Ekiga to work? As far as I know, the configuration should be fine (using STUN since the Ekiga wiki says I should), but I can't seem to connect to the echo test.
does it actually connect but you just can't hear anything?
I finally found the General History which tells me that it says "Remote user is unreachable"
If there is a place to put in an address for a stun server you can try stun.ekiga.net
Yep, it's already in there.
then erase it and save.. try to connect without it.... with a stun server you shouldn't need port forwarding.. you could also use stun01.sipphone.com  that's what stun.ekiga.net points to.
Ok, I'll try it.
try it both ways.. without the server listed and with the other one.,
Ok, neither one worked. I'm going to follow BoxMagnet's suggestion and forward the ports anyway.
k
Huh. Still unreachable. B-(
wierd...
I even added my IP to the DMZ on my router, so it can't be a forwarded ports thing...huh.
did you just install? and did you do all the updates?
Well, I had tried to configure it some time ago, but I found that my old router didn't let me forward ports. Now I have a new router, and I'm trying again.
which version of ekiga?
what version of ubuntu?
When I check the about page, it says "Thank you for your interest in Ubuntu
Ah, here we go. Update Manager says that I can upgrade to 9.04, so I must have the previous version, 8.10, if I remember correctly.
k.. that's an OLD version of ekiga.. they are up to 3.5.x and it looks MUCH nicer.. I'll see if I can find a ppa link for the download..
here is it.. read carefully.. there's a link to click for releases prior to 9.10.. https://launchpad.net/~sevmek/+archive/ekiga-stable-prerelease
Thanks!
enjoy!
